column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday January 31 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Inbound Paris Pike inside the Bourbon Co line
column5: The roadway remains closed due to slick roadway conditions.  State highway salt trucks are enroute.

column4: Richmond Rd between Shriners Ln and Lakeshore Dr
column5: The roadway remains closed in both directions until further notice due to downed electrical wires.  Inbound traffic diverted to Lakeshore Dr and outbound traffic diverted to Shriners Ln.

column4: Rosemont Garden at Southland Dr / Lafayette Pkwy
column5: The intersection is reportedly closed until further notice due to a 16" water main break.

column4: Fontaine Rd between Lakeshore Dr and E High St
column5: Increased congestion due to the closure on Richmond Rd.

column4: In effect until 1/31 at 1 p.m.  Chance of snow, freezing rain, and sleet.
Use added caution, slow down, increase following distances, and expect longer commute times.
Fayette County schools are operating on an NTI weather day.
